name: Fixel
description:
Fixel

WeeklyGameJam127 : Fix The Pixel

Objective
Dead pixels (the black ones) are taking over!
Fix the dead pixels and avoid the enemies! 

Controls
Movement: Mouse
Interact/Fix Pixel: Left Click / Left Click(hold)

PowerUps
Health: Gains 1 Life
Shield: Gains Invulnerability for a short duration
Burger: Gains the ability to destroy the enemy by touching them for short duration
Bomb: Destroys all enemies and fix all Pixels on screen
